Package com.ezasm.parsing

Class Lexer

java.lang.Object
com.ezasm.parsing.Lexer
public class Lexer extends Object
Static context functions regarding lexing and tokenizing Strings.

      Returns:

    • parseLine

      public static Line parseLine(String line, Map<String,Integer> labels, int number) throws ParseException
      Parses the given text as a single line. Meant for use within a simulation of the programming language.
      Parameters:
      line - the line of text.
      labels - the mapping of label text to line numbers.
      number - the line number of this line.
      Returns:
      null if the line was empty, a comment, or a label; otherwise returns the line corresponding to the text.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the line could not be properly parsed.

    • parseLines

      public static List<Line> parseLines(String lines, Map<String,Integer> labels) throws ParseException
      Parses a String containing multiple lines. Meant for use within a simulation of the programming language.
      Parameters:
      lines - the text containing the lines to parse.
      labels - the mapping of label text to line numbers.
      Returns:
      the list of valid lines of code found.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if any line could not be properly parsed.
